original_text: Then the Babylonians came to her, to the bed of love, and in their lust they defiled her. After she had been defiled by them, she turned away from them in disgust.
korean_text: 바벨론 사람이 나아와 연애하는 침상에 올라 음행으로 그를 더럽히매 그가 더럽힘을 입은 후에 그들을 싫어하는 마음이 생겼느니라

sentences.original_text: Then the Babylonians came to her
and in their lust they defiled her
After she had been defiled by them
she turned away from them in disgust
